contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{Unreferenced|date=October 2008}} {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = X Hits | Type = EP | Longtype = and [[Greatest hits]] | Artist = [[Liberty X]] | Cover = | Released = October 6, 2008 <small>([[United Kingdom|UK]])</small> | Recorded = 2001 - 2006 | Genre = [[Pop music|Pop]]<br>[[Dance music|Dance]]<br>[[R&B]] | Last album = ''[[X (Liberty X album)|X]]''<br />(2005) | This album = ''X Hits EP''<br />(2008) | Next album = ''X Hits Album''<br />(2008) }} '''''X Hits''''' is the first greatest hits album and the first EP by pop band [[Liberty X]] who disbanded in April 2007. The album contains 10 tracks voted by fans and was released on October 6, 2008. ==Info== The album was voted by fans in October 2008 with only 10 tracks confirmed as the track listing. ==Track listing== *[[Thinking It Over]] *[[Just A Little]] *[[Got To Have Your Love]] *[[Being Somebody]] *[[Jumpin]] *[[Everybody Cries]] *[[Song 4 Lovers]] *[[X (Liberty X song)|X]] *[[Just A Little Live]] *X ([[Bimbo Jones]] Remix) [[Category:Liberty X albums]] [[Category:2009 EPs]] [[Category:2009 greatest hits albums]] {{2000s-pop-album-stub}}
